name: GOO GROW
description:
You play as a purple GOO  who needs to collect spare goo too make it through levels and make it to end portals. There are only 10 levels.

The Controls

LEFT ARROW - roll left

RIGHT ARROW - roll right

SPACE - jump

R - restart

ESC - return to menu

Music  

Stevia Sphere - This Love Is Lightning (elevator 8) - https://steviasphere.bandcamp.com/
